class:
Class that handles JWT.
Represents used signature algorithm.
Represents token type.
Represents content type for this JWT.
Represents identifier of public key which should be used to verify signature. Note: Can be taken from [here](https://dashboard.virgilsecurity.com/api-keys)
Issuer containing application id. Note: Can be taken [here](https://dashboard.virgilsecurity.com)
Subject as identity.
Signature data.
Timestamp in seconds with expiration date.
Timestamp in seconds with issued date.
